snippet: With hits like "Jersey Shore'' on MTV and "The Daily Show with Jon Stewart'' on Comedy Central, Viacom's cable channels helped the company increase its overall revenues rise by 2 percent in the most recent quarter.
abstract: With hits like "Jersey Shore'' on MTV and "The Daily Show with Jon Stewart'' on Comedy Central, Viacom's cable channels helped the company increase its overall revenues rise by 2 percent in the most recent quarter.

headline.main: Cable Channels Help Lift Viacom Earnings
headline.print_headline: Higher Cable Fees Help Bolster Viacom’s Profit by 56%
